title: Yes, Burt Bacharach Wrote That. And You Can Dance to It.
description: Mark Morris’s “The Look of Love” is set to Bacharach songs. “People are always saying, ‘Oh my God, he wrote that?’ That’s why I’m doing it,” Morris said.
dc:creator: Brian Seibert
media:credit: Jeenah Moon for The New York Times
media:description: Mark Morris company dancers rehearsing “The Look of Love” at his studios in Brooklyn.
